title: Meeting Your Inner World
subtitle: A guided journey into the voices within
description: You contain multitudesâ€”different voices, feelings, and reactions that sometimes conflict. This course helps you meet these inner parts with curiosity instead of judgment, understand what they're trying to protect, and access the calm, compassionate core that can hold it all.

modules.title: Understanding Parts
modules.description: The multiplicity of mind and why parts exist

modules.title: Mapping Your System
modules.description: Identifying and understanding your inner parts

modules.title: Meeting Your Protectors
modules.description: Working with the parts that manage and defend

modules.title: Accessing Self
modules.description: Finding the core that can lead the system

whatYouLearn: Understand why you sometimes feel at war with yourself
Meet the different voices inside you with curiosity
Recognize when protective parts are running the show
Begin healing the parts that carry old pain
Create more harmony in your inner world
requirements: Shadow Work Foundations or equivalent experience helpful
Willingness to engage with inner dialogue

questions.question: What is the 'parts' perspective on the psyche?
options: That we have multiple personalities disorder
That we all contain different sub-personalities with their own feelings and agendas
That we should be one unified self

questions.question: What are 'protector' parts?
options: Parts that developed to protect us from pain, often through control or avoidance

questions.question: What are 'exiled' parts?
options: Parts that have been sent away permanently
Wounded parts carrying pain that protectors try to keep out of awareness

questions.question: What is 'Self' in parts work terminology?
options: The calm, compassionate core that can lead the internal system

questions.question: How should we approach protector parts?
options: With curiosity and appreciation for their protective intention
Let them completely run our lives

questions.question: What does 'unburdening' mean in parts work?
options: Releasing the pain, beliefs, or emotions a wounded part has been carrying

questions.question: Why is it important to get permission from protectors before approaching exiled parts?
options: Protectors can overwhelm or block access if they don't feel safe
